tool_description: Combines multiple textures into complete materials with proper shader parameters and engine compatibility.

material_name.description: Name for the material being composed

target_engine.description: Target game engine: unity, unreal, godot, custom

shader_type.description: Shader model: standard, pbr, toon, unlit

double_sided.description: Whether material renders on both sides

error_messages: Diffuse texture not found: Provide a valid diffuse_texture_id
Texture ID not found: One or more provided texture IDs are invalid
Invalid target engine: Use one of [unity, unreal, godot, custom]
Invalid shader type: Use one of [standard, pbr, toon, unlit]

usage: Provide material_name and diffuse_texture_id as minimum. Add additional texture maps and adjust parameters for advanced materials. Set target_engine for proper compatibility.

material_id.description: Unique identifier for the composed material

material_file_path.description: Path to the material definition file

texture_count.description: Number of textures used in the material

engine_compatibility.description: Target engine for which material was optimized
